newsitem.title: USA: Supreme Industries says costs to hurt Q4.
newsitem.headline: Supreme Industries says costs to hurt Q4.

text.p: Supreme Industries Inc said on Wednesday its fourth quarter results are likely to be hurt by costs associated with new facilities devoted to fiberglass reinforced panels and hardwood flooring.
Expenses related to the expansion of its distribution network and two new product lines also are likely to hurt that quarter's results, it said.

Those costs also proved to be a drag on its third quarter results, shrinking fully diluted earnings per share by $0.02 in the quarter and by $0.06 for the first nine months of the fiscal year, the company said.
